channel.title: Project Ambience
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hello all!
I really have no idea how to make an introduction for this....er....wait...did I just make an introduction? Eh, whatever.
Project Ambience was a project started last year, in July. I never got around to making it because of exams and school and whatnot, but I decided to start on it since my Spring Break is near.
What you see below is the version list of the server and client. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Server: V0.59 - As of 3/19/11 V1 V1.59 V2 V2.59 V3 V3.59 V4 V4.59 V5
Client: V0.59 - As of 3/19/11 V1 V1.59 V2 V2.59 V3
I had decided for Project Ambience to be perfected in combat, specifically, because the writing and implementing for the code for combat was very interesting in my eyes. Some bases will be for combat, some will be for stability, some will be for both, or some will be fit to start a server.
The Following May Be Used to Create Different Versions of Ambience: Delta PI WinterLove Made from Scratch More to Come..
Below will be the Log for this project, and please, no flaming, as I have not coded for a long time now, and am still trying to recover what I knew.
Project Ambience - Platform 21 -------------------------------------------------- 2/26/11 ----------- Worked on writing the code and scripts. Managed to make half of the base. ----------- 3/01/11 ----------- Finished base code and is ready to be worked on. ----------- 3/19/11 ----------- Worked on player rendering, and my client updates. I was able to get player rendering to work, still working on player saving. The client has several bugs that need to be worked out. ----------- 3/21/11 ----------- Worked on scripts, and other things such as what is supported. Pictures on what I have worked on will be available. Player Custom Commands have been added. ----------- 3/22/11 ----------- Worked on and finished Player Saving. Worked on lag fix, and working on process.java
Current Pictures: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/30bnrk6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/34zhi1e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/23vg3rt.png[/img]
Please keep this topic clean and nice, and try to stay on-topic :)
Also, this is nearly one of my first projects started ever since July last year..[s][Look at my join date][/s]
[B]* No, I will not have a developing team. * Yes, I will be working on this by myself.[/B][/CENTER]
[B]NOTE: I AM `Deviant of R.L!

item.title: Project Ambience
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. How are you handling the packets being sent and received by the client/server?
  2. If you wrote the client from scratch, how did you handle the 3d rendering, cache decompression, and the cache filesystem?
  3. Are you using standard IO or NIO? Are you using an NIO framework like netty or MINA?
  4. As asked previously, where are these tutorials about creating a framework of which you speak of?

Read full topic

item.title: Project Ambience
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

Mendorphins:

Plus also, where are these tutorials of writing a framework you speak of?

Yes, where are they? this sounds like bullshit to be honest with you.

Read full topic

So technically, the client is scratch.

item.dc:creator: @_Deviant `Deviant
item.description:
@_Deviant wrote:

@ALL

I probably won’t use PI, but it’s a suggestion, since PI is shit, and…

Above Post ^^

This was made from scratch, at least v0.59 is.

Also, I am not going to improve the same base over and over again, because, I would like to perfect different things.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Ambience
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=`Deviant link=topic=483348.msg3540773#msg3540773 date=1300839976]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=483348.msg3540769#msg3540769 date=1300839840]

Common sense that any of the versions will be based off of any of these.
[/quote]So, you’re going to make one version Delta, and then the next PI? etc.

If not, please elaborate, because ‘common sense’ has nothing to do with what you stated.

I guess I can fix it.

EDIT: Fixed.

EDIT2: Actually, yes, one will be based off of Delta, the next PI, etc.
[/quote]Why not just make one base, and improve it, then continue improving it?

P.S. Please don’t use PI. We have enough of them, and they all suck.[/quote]
I thought you were a PI supporter

Read full topic

[/quote]Doubt anything in it is made for scratch, since you said this:

[quote author=`Deviant link=topic=483348.msg3540462#msg3540462 date=1300827453]
The Bases That Will Be Used:
Delta (Possibly)
WinterLove
PI
Scratch (As in, Made from Scratch)
More to Come…
[/quote]Sounds more like you’re just throwing a bunch of crap together.[/quote]

Common sense that any of the versions will be based off of any of these.

Read full topic

@_Deviant wrote:

[CENTER]Hello all!

I really have no idea how to make an introduction for this…er…wait…did I just make an introduction? Eh, whatever.

Project Ambience was a project started last year, in July. I never got around to making it because of exams and school and whatnot, but I decided to start on it since my Spring Break is near.

What you see below is the version list of the server and client.

Server:
V0.59 - As of 3/19/11

I had decided for Project Ambience to be perfected in combat, specifically, because the writing and implementing for the code for combat was very interesting in my eyes. Some bases will be for combat, some will be for stability, some will be for both, or some will be fit to start a server.

The Following May Be Used to Create Different Versions of Ambience:
Delta
PI
WinterLove
Made from Scratch
More to Come…

Below will be the Log for this project, and please, no flaming, as I have not coded for a long time now, and am still trying to recover what I knew.

Project Ambience - Platform 21

2/26/11

Worked on writing the code and scripts.
Managed to make half of the base.

3/01/11

Finished base code and is ready to be worked on.

3/19/11

Worked on player rendering, and my client updates.
I was able to get player rendering to work, still working on player saving.
The client has several bugs that need to be worked out.

3/21/11

Player Custom Commands have been added.

Worked on lag fix, and working on process.java
